description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dvro2","text":"The polymerase chaine reaction (PCR) amplifies linear DNA using a DNA polymerase enzyme and a pair of short single-stranded DNA \"primers.\" This protocol amplifies a region that spans the Cas9 cut site so you can verify whether or not the URA3 \"patch\" inserted correctly (and thus disabled your gene.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dslv4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rqti","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88fsg","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4l41u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"73171DB01CB011ED81507F6B8404369D","height":347,"id":281895,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"pcr verification.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ivjjbvh6p.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ivjhbvh6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ivjibvh6p.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ivjgbvh6p.webp","width":550}}}}

title: Knockout PCR
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"6s6o","text":"None of the materials in this protocol are particularly hazardous. HOWEVER, we are shedding nucleases -- enzymes that degrade DNA -- all the time. Wear lab coats and gloves to keep your samples nuclease-free.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
